website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell All Out Crush Shield is the water-repellent version of the standard model. It is marketed to obstacle course lovers and trail runners alike. Merrell designs the shoe for soft and muddy surfaces with all-weather comfort in spades. With a very reasonable price, this is a solid option for those who need a grippy and fast partner that can take the runner from the door to any water-soaked outdoor surfaces.
pros: According to several reviewers, aside from extremely snowy conditions, the All Out Crush Shield’s water-repellent upper felt efficient when it came to staving off water, as well as dirt and mud
Many consumers thought that the price of this shoe is affordable
The lightweight nature of this shoe was welcomed by a lot of those who have tested it
The drainage ports were able to filter out water with ease, commented some satisfied trail running enthusiasts
The grip capability of the 5mm lugs was lauded
A handful noted that the Shield version of the All Out Crush is quite stylish
The 5mm lugs hold on to soft and mucky conditions
There were persons who appreciated the roomy toe-box, which allowed their toes to splay naturally
More than a few runners valued the arch support coming from the Shield version of the Merrell All Out Crush
A couple of expert reviewers praised the fast turnover through the gait cycle
cons: Some runners mentioned that the underfoot platform was a bit stiff
Despite the 5mm lugs and the rock protection plate, a handful of testers felt some underfoot pinching when running on rocky ground
The forefoot section of the upper unit felt too wide, according to a several purchasers
The outsole showed early signs of wear and tear, based on the observations of a handful of runners

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, sizing not bad, wear well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm undecided on the sizing but like the shoes. I wear boots 24/7 and wanted something for hiking and normal use besides my 4lb each boots. The toe box everyone talks about is nice and gives room and toe bashing protection. My shoe sizing is 12 wide but not available so I went straight 12 and they're not too tight. Good support. Look Cool. Keep feet cool and dry. Oh no they wear out like every other pair of shoes. Negative reviews can suck it. 2 weeks and I haven't left any cleats behind from them. Pick up your dam feet neanderthals. If you live the boot life these should be your sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far after about a month. Seems like the material will rip cause it feels like paper but I have hit it with a gate with loose wire, this would rip any shoe and that's that. This shoe has no imperfections so far though I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: 1st pair of trail running shoes and it makes a ton of difference when running off road. Merrill runs about a 1/2 size big so I got a half size smaller than my road running mizunos and they fit perfectly. I went for a run after it rained all morning and I had a ton of grip on the trails, awesome! If there is gravel on your route, you can still feel the rocks but it doesn't hurt like it does running off road in my road shoes. I would say if you don't wanna feel the rocks then maybe not this shoe because some trail shoes have harder soles, but these work well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They are dirty and have had a lot of miles walked in ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore these through Vietnam. They were a bit warm at times but worth it when I could tromp through puddles and keep my feet dry. They are dirty and have had a lot of miles walked in them now, but the tread is still almost like new! Also a very cozy shoe from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: As good as I expect from Merrell.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, great traction, and no wet feet after walking through a very dewy field. I bought these for Tough Mudder and expect them to perform very well.
customer_reviews.author: John Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: A good trail shoe that meets expectations. I used to exclusively use NB, but got tired of inconsistent fittings so these came up on offer. The sole is soft so they will wear down if used mostly on the "street". Overall a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: R King

customer_reviews.title: I like this shoe for OCR
customer_reviews.text: I like this shoe for OCR. Good fit. The only negative is the material doesn't breath. Its kind of "rubberized" so they get a little smelly and make your feet warmer and sweatier. I advise putting some kind of deodorizer in them after every run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped me on my Spartan Race
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! They're durable, have great traction up muddy hills and in gravel, and a supportive snug fit. I wore them on my first Spartan Race and I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: billy_goat

customer_reviews.title: Getting Ready for Tough Mudder
customer_reviews.text: Getting ready for Tough Mudder race. These are very comfortable and rugged, which is what I need. I will check in after the race for further comments.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Bowring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used them for a Tough Murder and they were fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old son picked these out and absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: H. Zajeski

customer_reviews.title: great sneaker by Merrell and Amazon got it to me ...
customer_reviews.text: As always .......... great sneaker by Merrell and Amazon got it to me quickly as always
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Good light weight running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have used trail running shoes for hiking. As a hiker they are a bit light but I think runners will love them
customer_reviews.author: G. Tuch

customer_reviews.title: Overall comfortable. The material of the upper is stiff and ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall comfortable. The material of the upper is stiff and does not break in easily.
customer_reviews.author: Practical tactical

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I use it for kickboxing. The best. Too bad they discontinued the line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Did my first Tough Mudder with these new shoes and they performed very well. Muddy hills were no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nick santoro

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are really excellent shoes. They fit well about the foot to provide great arch support. It is worth noting that the out-sole is composed of an extremely pliable tacky rubber; this is really excellent for grip; however it does allow for rapid degeneration. Further, there is essentially no ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Off road shoe, they don't like to be worn on pavement. Plenty of room in the toe box and good arch support. Good traction, if you run off road or on the shoulder of the road these work well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but after I walk the treadmill for 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but after I walk the treadmill for 30 minutes I have to clean up several rubber crumbs which come from the soles of the shoes. This is annoying otherwise, I would rate as 5 star based on fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: I have had several pairs of merrell hiking shoes and love them but this shoe did not live up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected from merrell. I have had several pairs of merrell hiking shoes and love them but this shoe did not live up to the name
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a merrell fan; Ive been purchasing their shoes for years. Lightweight and durable construction.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Calejo

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's All Out Crush Shield Trail Running Shoe, Dark Slate, 7 D(M) UK
product_meta.description: Happy trails, no matter the weather. All-over protection keeps water out so feet stay dry when the going gets gnarly on your late-season trail runs.
feature_bullets: Durable, water repellent tpu coated mesh upper for protection
Outer Material: Leather, Textile and Synthetic
Reflective details for increased visibility in low light
